postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price falls below $37K amid little hope of a definitive weekend bounce
postTranslate.leadText: Support at $36,000 may also be temporary, one trader warns, after a major Binance buy wall is obliterated.

postTranslate.title: Joining the ranks: Bitcoin’s correlation with gold and stocks is growing
postTranslate.leadText: BTC used to be an uncorrelated asset, but that’s no longer the case. What can gold and stocks suggest about the crypto markets?

postTranslate.title: Chinese Bitcoin mining shakeout may have surprise BTC price consequences — analyst
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin's production cost is dropping, and price action often rebounds to new highs if it dips below it, data shows.

postTranslate.title: Banking giant BBVA debuts Bitcoin trading and custody for Swiss clients
postTranslate.leadText: BBVA Switzerland will soon begin offering Bitcoin trading to private banking clients while not providing any advisory services on crypto investments.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin pinned below $38K as investors stash record $756 billion with Fed
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin bulls ducked for cover as the Federal Reserve started paying interest rate returns on cash deposits via its reverse repurchase program.

postTranslate.title: Miami mayor offers city's clean nuclear power to Chinese Bitcoin miners
postTranslate.leadText: Mayor Francis Suarez wants to make Miami a Bitcoin mining hub by offering the city’s cheap, clean nuclear energy supply.

postTranslate.title: Russian oligarch Deripaska blasts Bank of Russia for ignoring Bitcoin
postTranslate.leadText: Russia needs to move to Bitcoin to provide a “real financial instrument enabling independence in foreign trade settlements,” Deripaska argued.

postTranslate.title: City in Sichuan reportedly orders crypto miners to shut down for investigation
postTranslate.leadText: Crypto miners in Ya'an City have reportedly been ordered to temporarily shut down their operations.

postTranslate.title: Denmark’s largest bank cautious on crypto, but won't interfere
postTranslate.leadText: Danske Bank isn't completely sold on cryptocurrency but said it won't stop its customers from using its services in connection with crypto platforms.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price completes leg down to $37.4K as key indicator hits record ‘oversold’ level
postTranslate.leadText: Another slight decline sees Bitcoin at a crossroads as sellers erode a major exchange buy wall.

postTranslate.title: Has the Doge had its day? Dogecoin interest cools
postTranslate.leadText: Interest is falling across several metrics, but can you keep a good Doge down?

postTranslate.title: Goldman Sachs analysts divided over whether Bitcoin is an 'investable asset class'
postTranslate.leadText: Goldman has flip-flopped again declaring crypto assets as unworthy of investment in the same week it expands its crypto trading desk.

postTranslate.title: Traders search for bearish signals after Bitcoin futures enter backwardation
postTranslate.leadText: Analysts search for bearish signals after the June BTC futures trade below spot exchange pricing.

postTranslate.title: Shanghai Man: Economist says El Salvador 'on road to death', salaries paid in e-CNY ...
postTranslate.leadText: Former banking heads question foreign financial policies, workers paid with digital yuan in milestone pilot and a large Series A is closed by DeFi platform SynFutures.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin retests $37K support, gold and stocks drop lower over Fed comments
postTranslate.leadText: Steady BTC inflows to crypto exchanges and fallout from the Federal Reserve’s plan to hike interest rates dropped Bitcoin price to the $37,000 support.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin hashrate hits 8-month low as Chinese miners power down
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin’s hashrate plummets to roughly 91 EH/s as Sichuan miners close up shop.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin is ‘own worst enemy' and will lose to Ethereum: Charles Hoskinson
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin is too slow when compared to Ethereum and other proof-of-stake networks, argued Cardano founder, Charles Hoskinson.

postTranslate.title: 4 reasons why Paul Tudor Jones' 5% Bitcoin exposure advice is difficult for major funds
postTranslate.leadText: Major funds are probably interested in Bitcoin and altcoins, but four significant hurdles are preventing them from investing.

postTranslate.title: Top 5 cryptocurrencies to watch this week: BTC, ADA, THETA, XMR, AMP
postTranslate.leadText: If Bitcoin price remains in the current range, ADA, THETA, XMR and AMP could bounce higher over the coming days.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price can hit $450K in 2021, $135K is 'worst-case scenario' — PlanB
postTranslate.leadText: The only way is (more or less) up for BTC price action, the analyst insists, offering a potential 2021 high of $450,000.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin price dips below $34K as day of Grayscale's giant BTC unlocking draws near
postTranslate.leadText: Downward volatility hits the market on Sunday, as market participants argue that most of the drop is already complete.

postTranslate.title: NFT art galleries: Future of digital artwork or another crypto fad?
postTranslate.leadText: Physical NFT art galleries are popping up all over, but why? And does the public appreciate them, regardless of their crypto knowledge?

postTranslate.title: 3 reasons why Ethereum may underperform Bitcoin in the short-term
postTranslate.leadText: Ether could take longer than 12 months to regain ground versus Bitcoin due to increased uncertainties surrounding the shift to ETH 2.0 and reservations from institutional investors.

postTranslate.title: Data suggests the strong US dollar makes Bitcoin weaker argument is flawed
postTranslate.leadText: Analysts and traders are linking Bitcoin's bearish turn with the growing strength of the U.S. dollar, but data suggests otherwise.

postTranslate.title: Bitcoin may lose $30K price level if stocks tank, analysts warn
postTranslate.leadText: Downside risks for BTC price are also heightened due to the recent dollar bounce.

postTranslate.title: Hawkish Fed comments push Bitcoin price and stocks lower again
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin price drops a leg lower and stocks slump after St. Lous Federal Reserve President James Bullard signals that interest rates could rise by the end of this year.

postTranslate.title: Bulls hesitate to buy the dip after Bitcoin price falls close to $35K
postTranslate.leadText: Bitcoin’s drop to $35,130 has bulls hesitant to buy the current dip but on-chain data shows long-term holders continue to accumulate.

postTranslate.title: Crypto company CEO says the recent crypto boom brought increased adoption
postTranslate.leadText: Crypto usage in 2021 differs from the 2017 rally, according to the CEO of StormX.

postTranslate.title: Price analysis 6/18: BTC, ETH, BNB, ADA, DOGE, XRP, DOT, UNI, LTC, BCH
postTranslate.leadText: Traders expect further downside from Bitcoin and altcoins after BTC dropped below a key support level at $36,000.

postTranslate.title: Goldman Sachs to offer Bitcoin futures trading in partnership with Galaxy Digital
postTranslate.leadText: Mike Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital will serve as the counterparty entity for Goldman Sachs’s Bitcoin futures trading product.
